name: Erns Valdez
text: The food is great, good beer selection but gets very busy and service is slow. That pretty much sums up.the.experience but it's worth it. Food takes a while but it's all made fresh and is really good. It's a small restaurant so it fills up fast. They do have a cool little patio and theirs plenty of parking. Staff is nice.

name: Angelea Liwanag
text: Good but expensive. I got the pear and gorgonzola salad (added chicken). I understand presentation is important and there's a standard to follow according to corporate, but FOUR thin slices of pear for the entire salad?! That's a little ridiculous. Trust me, there weren't any other slices in there. I had to ask for extra.

name: Tim Cardenas
text: The truffle basil fries were on POINT!!! The vegan Berkley pizza was very tasty, I dont care for thin crust,  but this one was damn good! The only thing I wish they had were buffalo cauliflower.

name: Stephen Davis
text: Mixed feelings. Went there with a colleague to have a cigar on their patio. The system is a little clunky here in that you go to the register to get a wrist band thing (has an RFID chip in it) to activate the self/serve beer taps. Fair ‚Ä¶More

text: Under new management within the past few weeks, this place is definitely worth a try!  And a return visit, and another...The pizzas are a satisfying thin-crust with just the right amount of toppings and cheese.  It is easy to order right ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian McGlothlin
text: The beer and wine self tap is great idea and works fairly well. They appear to have lowered the prices so it's more in line with the local brewery prices, or even a bit cheaper. ‚Ä¶More

name: William Woods
text: My Calzone was burnt on bottom real bad and hard to completely eat. Only able to digest the top portion. Other than that it's a very tasty dish... just blacker than I like. Please make this right and I will return my business and share how good it taste to people I know

text: Experience was great. Will go back soon. The concept of you tapping your own drinks is pretty cool. The food was great. Multiple screens for your sports and cool little entertainment for kids. I expect this place to outgrow its location.

text: Loved this place. It is under new management and it is such an improvement.  The staff is friendly and efficient. They serve local brews with a wide variety to meet everyone's taste. We will definitely be coming back.

text: One of my favorite restaurants! Food is always fresh and healthy. Prices are great. Perfect spot for lunch or dinner especially if you love sports! Plenty of craft beers and wine on tap. Never had a bad experience at any ZPizza! Audrey is the best!

name: Benjamin Davis
text: Great customer service, they don't mind putting whatever game on as long as they have the channel. Pizza is extremely good for a good deal. They allow you to pour your own beer straight off the tap so it's fun if you have a solid pour.

name: Amanda M
text: Its always a fun experience here. The tap room option is a unique choice and they always have a variety to choose from. Staff is always friendly and handy if we ever have any questions whether it be about the beverages or food. Defiantly going back and I've already told several friends about this place.
